problem.markdown:
Move the cursor over the chart and read some of the windows which pop up to show details.
>>What does each dot represent? (2 attempts)<<
(x) A. The total ANC 1 value and total ANC 4 value ( ) B. The total ANC 1 value ( ) C. The total ANC 4 value ( ) D. The total District value
[explanation] Each dot represents the total ANC 1 value (on the vertical axis) and total ANC 4 value (on the horizontal axis) for one district for the 12-month period. [explanation]

multiplechoiceresponse.p: Move the cursor over the chart and read some of the windows which pop up to show details.
multiplechoiceresponse.label: What does each dot represent? (2 attempts)

choicegroup.choice: A. The total ANC 1 value and total ANC 4 value

div.p: Each dot represents the total ANC 1 value (on the vertical axis) and total ANC 4 value (on the horizontal axis) for one district for the 12-month period.
